General.Name: Chengdu Wintrue Holding Co Ltd
General.Description: Chengdu Wintrue Holding Co., Ltd. produces and sells compound fertilizers. Its products include compound fertilizer, soda ash, ammonium chloride, monoammonium phosphate, yellow phosphorus, edible salt, industrial salt, etc. The company was formerly known as Shindoo Chemi-Industry Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Chengdu Wintrue Holding Co., Ltd. in September 2016. Chengdu Wintrue Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Chengdu, China.
